trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs> specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>指定當使用者按下的按鍵由所組成的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property returns an uppercase K.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當使用者按下 SHIFT + K、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>屬性會傳回大寫的 k。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event occurs when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件發生於使用者按下按鍵時。

trans-unit.source: Two events that are closely related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: 密切相關的兩個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event precedes each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event when the user presses a key, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event occurs when the user releases a key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件位於每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>時使用者按下按鍵，事件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件發生於使用者鬆開按鍵時。

trans-unit.source: When the user holds down a key, duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> events occur each time the character repeats.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按住按鍵時，重複<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件發生的每個字元重複的時間。

trans-unit.source: One <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event is generated upon release.
trans-unit.target: 一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>版本時，就會產生事件。

trans-unit.source: With each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs> is passed.
trans-unit.target: 與每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>傳遞。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>傳遞與每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>指定任何輔助按鍵 （CTRL、 shift 鍵或 ALT） 已按下以及另一個索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: (This modifier information can also be obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.)
trans-unit.target: (您也可以透過取得此修飾詞資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別。)

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>至`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。

trans-unit.source: This keeps the control from processing the key press.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止控制項處理按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Some controls will process certain key strokes on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: 有些控制項將會在處理某些按鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> processes the Enter key before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> is called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>處理 Enter 鍵，然後再<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: In such cases, you cannot cancel the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, and must cancel the key stroke from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，您無法取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件，且必須取消從按鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>改為。

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs> to count keys as they are pressed and to display the results after each key press.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>計算索引鍵，使用者按下並顯示結果之後每個按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> is then set to true to keep the operating system from further processing the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> 然後設為 true 會保持作業系統從進一步處理索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a form with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> placed on it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設的表單具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>置於其上。

trans-unit.source: You must create a new instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立這個類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You must also set the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須設定事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You can do this in the constructor for your class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在建構函式中為您的類別。

trans-unit.source: When the specified event is raised in the control, the attached method is called and the application can execute code in response to the event.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項中引發指定的事件時，呼叫附加的方法時，應用程式可執行程式碼，以回應事件。

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character corresponding to the key the user pressed.
trans-unit.target: 對應使用者所按下按鍵的 ASCII 字元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the current state of the modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ModifierKeys%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來取得輔助按鍵的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a message box that shows the current state of the SHIFT key.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示訊息方塊顯示 SHIFT 鍵的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress" /> event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示是否處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已處理則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的事件，它會傳送至作業系統的預設處理中。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>至`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `keypressed` method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to check whether the ENTER key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: `keypressed`方法會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>屬性來檢查是否已按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: If the ENTER key is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 按下 ENTER 鍵時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性設定為`true`，表示事件處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對應於所按下按鍵的字元。

trans-unit.source: The ASCII character that is composed.
trans-unit.target: 組合的 ASCII 字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者按下 SHIFT + K，這個屬性就傳回大寫的 K。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>範例按鍵在執行階段，並修改特殊執行階段的情況下的按鍵輸入的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>要停用非數字的按鍵，當使用者輸入郵遞區號時，變更為大寫資料欄位中的項目，所有依字母順序排列的按鍵或監視鍵盤或其他金鑰的輸入的裝置特定的索引鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the following keys:
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得或設定下列機碼：

trans-unit.source: a-z, A-Z.
trans-unit.target: a 到 z、 A 到 Z。

trans-unit.source: CTRL.
trans-unit.target: CTRL 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Punctuation marks.
trans-unit.target: 標點符號。

trans-unit.source: Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad.
trans-unit.target: 數字鍵，同時在頂端的鍵盤和數字鍵台上。

trans-unit.source: ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 輸入。

trans-unit.source: You cannot get or set the following keys:
trans-unit.target: 您無法取得或設定下列機碼：

trans-unit.source: The TAB key.
trans-unit.target: TAB 鍵。

trans-unit.source: INSERT and DELETE.
trans-unit.target: 插入和刪除。

trans-unit.source: HOME.
trans-unit.target: 首頁。

trans-unit.source: END.
trans-unit.target: 結束。

trans-unit.source: PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN.
trans-unit.target: PAGE UP 和 PAGE down 鍵。

trans-unit.source: ALT.
trans-unit.target: ALT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 方向鍵

trans-unit.source: For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何偵測任何非字元按鍵上述資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `keypressed` method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to check whether the ENTER key pressed.
trans-unit.target: `keypressed`方法會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>屬性來檢查是否按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: If the ENTER key is pressed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 按下 ENTER 鍵時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性設定為`true`，表示事件處理。
